description: President Macron also beefs up border security, as France remains on its highest security level.
title: France terror attacks: Macron calls for EU free movement reform
title_page: France terror attacks: Macron calls for EU free movement reform - BBC News
maintext: And, in a letter to the Financial Times, he made clear France was fighting "Islamist separatism, never Islam". He accused the British newspaper of misquoting him in an article - which has since been removed from its website - suggesting he was "stigmatising French Muslims for electoral purposes".
